title: Cryptocurrencies dive back down despite a slew of good news – is this proof that whales are moving the market?
text:

The new alt coins are being used to steal market value from bitcoin, then they dissappear.  The creators(likely governments) have unlimited free coins. So, after the first explosion of value for an individual coin there is enough value transfered from bitcoin to the new altcoin, that is when they undersell anyone trying to sell out with their nearly unlimited supply of the altcoin. Essentially wiping out billions in a matter of minutes. They don’t care what happens to the coin afterward.  These coins are not like bitcoin which many setting can not be changed.  The creators of many of the altcoins have permissions to change whatever they want and mine as many as they want at whatever difficulty.

DK
True, the real reason for alts was the quick buck leeching of the bitcoin brand (as most bitcoin devopers will attest, especially the new fork from China), there are a few of real value Bitcion itself, Dogecoin a widely used tipcoin, namecoin which is generated from Bitcoin and we cannot yet use the features. Ethereum looked like a developer scamcoin, people are ijust nvesting in the vapour ware. As to the rest we have the Alt sex trade coins, coins you buy drugs with and the odd ones for failed states i.e. Agoras tokens all of which get pumped and dumped. Myself I have Dogecoin as a long term investment since it has a stable community.
The current pump and dump is Polonex and Bittrex based bankster Whales pumping then shorting the market with the exchanges knowledge. They got burnt before Christmas when Chinese investers created the 2017 bubble out of sync with their shorting, but now the Chinese have sold up for the new year the Whales are back in charge until February.
